__e: But it's just that, you know, if I'm gonna really... stay clean and sober, as they say in the program.
You stay clean, pull your shit together, I will do whatever I can to help make that happen.
Stay clean and stay out of my way, we won't have a problem.
I'm 20 days sober... again... hoping to make it to 21.
The really fucked up thing is I had three years clean before that, and now I'm back to zero.
Then I think how it took me 20 years to get 20 days of sobriety, and... seems like it's too much to give up.
